actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chaos-spawn goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Psychic Stab (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The chaos-spawn goblin targets one creature that it can sense within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Escape
special_abilities.desc: The chaos-spawn goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
